items.name: Entrecôte
items.description: Grilled on a lava stone, served with a mixed salad and fries. Recommended doneness: rare.

items.name: Duck Breast
items.description: Pan-seared, served with a blueberry sauce and sautéed potatoes. Recommended doneness: medium-rare.

items.name: Chicken Fillets
items.description: Grilled, served with cherry tomatoes, sautéed potatoes, and a mushroom sauce.

items.name: Fish of the Day
items.description: Flambéed, accompanied by herb-infused mashed potatoes and a creamy lemon sauce.

items.name: El Padre Burger
items.description: Fresh beef patty, bacon, cheddar, pickles, burger sauce, caramelized onions. Served with fries.

items.name: Homemade Breaded Chicken Burger
items.description: Pickles, lettuce, cheddar, white sauce. Served with fries.

items.name: Kids' Menu
items.description: Burger with fries and a Capri-Sun.

items.name: Carbonara
items.description: Cream, bacon, egg yolk, and Parmesan shavings.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Sliced chicken cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce.

items.name: Arrabiata
items.description: Lightly spicy homemade tomato sauce, with Parmesan shavings.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, topped with sliced chicken, garlic croutons, and Parmesan shavings.

items.name: El Padre Salad
items.description: Mixed salad with homemade vinaigrette, parsley-sautéed shrimp, tomatoes, pomegranate seeds, and avocado.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Slightly warm, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Served with speculoos sauce or berry sauce.

items.name: 3-Scoop Ice Cream Cup
items.description: Flavors based on the chef’s suggestion.
